name: ax13dgen4
body: |- wi(wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))

comment: Degenerate instance of ~ ax-13 where bundled variables ` x ` , ` y ` , and ` z ` have a common substitution. Therefore, also a degenerate instance of ~ ax13dgen1 , ~ ax13dgen2 , and ~ ax13dgen3 . Also an instance of the intuitionistic tautology ~ pm2.21 . Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. (Contributed by NM, 13-Apr-2017.) Reduce axiom usage. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 10-Oct-2021.)
